document_data.name: Garlic Slicer
document_data.creator: [[Rab Bitnez]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Garlic Slicer''' was a corrosive and offputting [[dagger]] that was created by the [[garlic]]-obsessed [[wizard]] [[Rab Bitnez]].
document_data.Description: Garlic Slicer was an ordinary-looking short but sharp dagger that reeked of garlic.
document_data.Powers: Rab Bitnez peeled and sliced countless cloves in his life, so many in fact, that the blade's edge absorbed the properties of garlic, making it corrosive to unprotected skin, dealing [[acid]]-like damage when wielded in combat. The negative effect of the blade, however, was it's pungency, effectively reducing the owner's charisma.
document_data.Notable Owners: *Rab Bitnez had Garlic Slicer in his possession ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
